results.title: Samsung teased a very slim phone called the Galaxy S25 Edge
results.description:

results.author: Sachi Mulkey
results.title: The Cause of the LA Fires Might Never Be Known—but AI Is Hunting for Clues
results.description: The source of more than half of all wildfires in the Western US remains unknown, so the US Forest Service has teamed up with computer scientists to create tools that can find answers.
